column5: i am an avid senko user. its my go to bait for almost anything.
Just thought there was some interesting ideas in that video that maybe people hadn't seen.
Those guys have a pretty interesting youtube channel, given their location it is geared towards the bass fisherman but methods and techniques cross over.
great video for sure,and they explain things great.....good tips too.....thanks for sharing

Believe it or not I have never thrown a Senko. I know guys swear by them and they work. My B-I-L that never fished until he retired uses them and he catches some nice fish for a novice, for anyone really. Now that I have seen how to properly use them a pac of Yamamoto Senko's will be in my Christmas stocking, I hope. What are some "go to" colours for Smallies and Walleye?  Thanks for the link my Buckeye friend.
No experience to speak of with them myself Old, I was already sick when they came out, and using what I had itself was a problem.

Believe it or not I have never thrown a Senko. I know guys swear by them and they work. My B-I-L that never fished until he retired uses them and he catches some nice fish for a novice, for anyone really. Now that I have seen how to properly use them a pac of Yamamoto Senko's will be in my Christmas stocking, I hope. What are some "go to" colours for Smallies and Walleye?  Thanks for the link my Buckeye friend.   Make sure to get a pack of white. They work with everything.  For me, for smallies green has worked well and blue. I know some people swear by pink but I have never used them.
Thanks guys. I asked the fishing question where multiple answers will be given.What colour is best?
Three colours I use, black, white and pumpkin seed

IMO senkos are one of those baits you can't have enough colours - more than any other bait I have noticed one guy catching, other guy fishing due to senko colour If I had to pick favorites: Baby bass (green and white) Ragin Cajun - green pumpkin with red flake Black and blue  - called june bug a lot Pink
Orange Pumpkin all the way,  a discontinued color of Root Beer was also very good.
